lily.name: Lily
lily.description: Lily is said to be extremely friendly, and interacts well with other animals. She prefers grass over hay. Will be protective of other animals, but not her brother for some reason. Larry is her twin brother.

larry.name: Larry
larry.description: This Peruvian llama is said to be highly intelligent, as well as very territorial. He's...known for spitting a lot, and is quite noisy. Has a short temper. Lily is his twin sister.

vonnie.name: Vonnie
vonnie.description: Although tall in stature, Vonnie is known for his thick coat of wool, often having multiple haircuts per year. His wool is mostly used for textiles and clothing.

gherardo.name: Gherardo
gherardo.description: Gherardo is a well-known and well-trained companion. He is very protective of the animals he is with.

llamared.name: Llamared
llamared.description: This llama is well known across South Korea for formerly touring with the popular K-Pop Band known as BTS. Llamared is very energetic, and has attained some muscle mass.

lladavid.name: Llavid
lladavid.description: Llavid has been given the nickname 'Llama McQueen' by his previous owners for a good reason. This llama from India has been reported to reach speeds of at least 60 miles per hour, beating his llama counterparts.

llamarc.name: Llamarc
llamarc.description: Llamarc is said to be highly intelligent, as well as quiet and reserved. Enjoys observing objects, other animals, and people from a distance, and is fascinated by airplanes.

llomeo.name: Llomeo
llomeo.description: Llomeo is known for having luxious and healthy hair, which is more abundant on his head. Very polite and friendly. Enjoys watching Llavid racing other llamas at a high speed.

barack.name: Barack Llama
barack.description: Barack Llama is said to exhibit qualities equivalent to that of an American President, as he often seen being followed by other llamas. Is said to be the leader of the pack.

joe.name: Joe Llamiden
joe.description: Joe Llamiden, one of the oldest llamas in the United States, currently leads over a dozen llamas in his herd. Somewhat forgetful, but very friendly.

nicki.name: Nicki Llamaj
nicki.description: Nicki Llamaj is known for making repetitive noises, as if she was rapping. Speaks rather fast and is very talkative, and other llamas are enamoured with her unique voice. Is attracted to the color Pink, and is quite energetic specifically on Fridays.

aoyoma.name: Aoyoma
aoyoma.description: Aoyama is a rather fierce llama, and tends to stand her ground (as always) in response to perceived threats. Enjoys eating grass, and swimming in ponds.
